name: arch::boot::multiboot2::parse_acpi_arg

multiboot2::RsdpV2Tag::xsdt_address.doc:
Physical address of the XSDT table.

 On x86, this is truncated from 64-bit to 32-bit.

multiboot2::RsdpV1Tag::rsdt_address.doc: The physical (I repeat: physical) address of the RSDT table.
